author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Adding the modified version of HGCal geometry in view of the changes in the Engineering Drawing of endcap region dated October, 2019. A new scenario will be created once other checks with simulation and reconstructions are tested. It also affects muon system (namely ME0 or GE0)

#### PR validation:

Doing the standard tests using runTheMatrix and also checked overlaps

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx239 Adding version 12 of HGCal Geometry
